Two heads are better than one. So, two burners are better than one. Gas grills with 2 burners have the potential to promise you a great barbeque experience with friends and family who appreciate your grilling skills.

For this BBQ experience, fast cooking abilities, cooking power, and advanced features are needed. All of which are incorporated into these amazing units, which is why they are preferred among the experts.

So after knowing this, we are sure that you will want to take a look at our list of the best 2 burner gas grills in the market.

Reviews of the Best 2 Burner Gas Grills

1. Char-Broil Signature TRU-Infrared 325 2-Burner Cabinet Liquid Propane Gas Grill

This is a small sized giant. It is perfect if you want to become a barbecue master and deliver amazing food for your party. It is not only the grill but also its premium features which include porcelain-coated cast iron grates and top-ported 443 Stainless steel burners which make this 2 burner infrared gas grill perfect for anyone.

The cooking system allows you to cook with a greater temperature control using infrared technology. The Infrared heat is powered by its 2 Top Ported 443 Stainless steel burners helping to prevent hot and cold spots on the grills surface using less gas.

Infrared grilling has become a trend for 2018 in outdoor cooking. An infrared grill comes with infrared technology as the main source of heat.

In a regular gas grill, the flame heats the grates directly but in an infrared grill, there is an infrared element between the grates and the flame.

So how does an infrared system work? Well, the answer is that the gas heats the infrared element which then radiates intense heat. Grill experts confirm that infrared grills are the best for searing meat, providing uniform heat and cutting down on flare-ups.

Not only does it have 2 amazing infrared burner systems but also has a large and strong stainless steel door that protects the gas tank and allows additional storage of many items like wood chips, grill tools, sauces, and rubs.

The grill sits on 4 casters, two of which lock, for increased mobility and stability. With the increasing popularity of natural gas grills, this amazing grill can easily convert from liquid propane (lp) to natural gas (ng) with a natural gas conversion kit.

It has an easy to read, lid mounted temperature gauge to monitor temperature. The Steel lid and firebox stand have durable porcelain coating to stand up to any weather condition. Furthermore, there are folding side shelves, allowing this spectacular grill to give you the power to be a master griller.

Pros

  • Comes with the infrared system
  • Temperature Gauge incorporated for perfect control

Cons

  • Outdoor use only
  • On the heavier side and difficult to carry
Check Price on Amazon

2. Char-Broil Classic 280 2-Burner Liquid Propane Gas Grill

This model of Char-Broil creates 20,000 BTUs of heat across the 280 square inches cooking surface area which is perfect to place as many kinds of food you can imagine for a great barbecue event with your friends and family.

But what produces this amount of heat that creates that perfect balanced temperature that will deliver amazing grilled food? Two stainless steel in-line burners are the heart of this grill and capable of producing enough heat to cook as fast as you desire.

This great grill comes with two metal side shelves to increase storage and prep space. The unit sits on two 6-inch wheels for easy portability and two fixed legs to keep it in place.

Additionally, it is a unit that is built to last. For an affordable price, you not only get this wonderful 2 burner grill but also an all season cover and a steel barbecue set with storage case.

Pros

  • Amazing heat distribution
  • Great Portability and stability
  • Durable

Cons

  • It does not come with a cover
  • A thermometer is not included
  • It lacks enough space for the gas tank
Check Price on Amazon

3. Char-Broil Performance 300 2-Burner Cabinet Liquid Propane Gas Grill- Black

This grill comes with 2 cabinets that reach 24,000 BTUs of heat across the 300 square inches cooking surface area. It combines elegance and performance in the most desirable manner making sure that you look fantastic cooking with this black 2 burner grill while preparing amazing plates for your guests.

The model is thoughtfully incorporated with a porcelain-coated lid and stainless steel UFC to prepare your dishes without any risk of destroying the food before it goes to the plate.

It also comes with metal side shelves, stainless steel top-ported burners, electronic ignition, and a lid-mounted temperature gauge. All of this only complement this fantastic black 2 burner grill.

One major problem with this unit is that the cabinet has to be built and also that it is a little too heavy.

Pros

  • Elegant Black Color
  • Stainless steel top ported burners
  • Temperature Gauge and Electronic Ignition

Cons

  • Cabinet has to be built
  • Heavy
  • Small sized (for few people only)
Check Price on Amazon

4. Giantex Propane Gas Grill 2 Burner Stainless Steel BBQ TableTop

Do you love camping? Are there any good options for a 2 burner unit for camping? This is the perfect option for you and your family.

A first look into the 2 burners with 20,000 BTUs, Universal LPG. Its burners deliver a well-balanced amount of heat letting you prepare any kind of food that you may want.

The model is particularly built for BBQ lovers and explorers. This 2 grill burner offers durability and an easy-to-clean surface.

It has a two push-and-turn ignition system for a quick and easy start-up, foldable legs and a lockable lid for portable transport and storage.

The unit is lightweight enough to be carried everywhere making it perfect for tailgating, camping, picnics, boating or anywhere your travels may take you.

Pros

  • Easy to use
  • Easy to carry
  • Balanced temperature and great performance

Cons

  • Really small (only for small amounts of food)
  • Not so resistant
  • Easy to lose
Check Price on Amazon

5. Master Cook Professional 2-Burner Liquid Propane Gas Grill

This unit from Master Cook puts out a 32,000 BTU-per-hour promising a unique experience of temperature control and well-balanced cooking.

Its integrated piezoelectric ignition system gives you the opportunity to always be ready to grill perfect dishes.

There are several reasons why it is considered to be a very well-constructed product. It has a stainless steel shroud with a centrally mounted thermometer.

You also get the foldable black powder coated side tables and a stainless steel control panel mounted right at the front. The firebox is also porcelain coated making it more durable while the heavy-duty, swivel black casters add to the robustness of the model.

It has a stainless steel lid with black end caps and stainless steel handles. And of course we cant forget about the heart of the grill, its two amazing stainless steel burners.

While it undoubtedly leads to a great cooking experience, the problem lies in the fact that it does not have a cover, making it vulnerable and somewhat difficult to transport. One needs to assemble it, which is also time-consuming.

Pros

  • Great performance
  • Perfect cooking area
  • Sturdy construction
  • Balanced temperature

Cons

  • Not easy to carry
  • Needs to be assembled
  • Doesnt come with a cover
Check Price on Amazon

To summarize everything

We have presented to you a list of the best 2 burner gas grills in the market for 2018.
To be fair the real final decision is on you. If you ask us, we highly recommend to you theChar-Broil Signature TRU-Infrared 325 2-Burner Cabinet Liquid Propane Gas Grillsince this is the one that adds the amazing infrared system included with all of its great features that this masterpiece can provide to you.

No matter what final decision that you make, the choice needs to be a two burner grill. Any of these powerful units will be able to provide an unforgettable experience for all your guests while also providing the best for your own grilling expertise.

Why Do You Need A 2 Burner Gas Grill?

To barbecue with the best flavor and speed, you will need more space and more heat. This is why we recommend you a two burner gas grill. This kind of grill is one that will fulfill all the requirements needed to create an unforgettable barbecue.

More Heat and More Power

Burners are the primary sources of heat and power that your grill needs and 2 burners apply more heat and more power that ultimately leads to a more desirable barbecue experience.

Effective Temperature Control

With a 2 burner unit, you can control the temperature with heightened effectiveness. If you have been grilling for quite some time, obtaining the desired amount of heat in a unit will be as easy as pie.

Deeper Engagement in Cooking

You will be able to listen to the searing and sizzling sound of the meat, satisfying not only your taste buds but also your earbuds.

Now that we know why 2 burners are better than one lets take a look at the top-rated options of the best 2 burner gas grills on sale that you can purchase in the market in 2018.

We also created a list in which includes many types of gas grills that we think will be helpful for you if youre a newbie to grilling.
